sentences: Muscles of the neck are described separately from the compartments
name: nec

sentences: They bound the neck triangles.In anatomy, the neck is also called by its Latin names, cervix or collum, although when used alone, in context, the word cervix more often refers to the uterine cervix, the neck of the uterus
